Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: Yo. I listened to what you said. Well. I must forewarn you. In my old =
RPG, NBMSSO, I thought the exact same thing. Earth was overdone, time to go=
 to Cybertron. But guess what? Going to Cybertron MURDERED my RPG. It becam=
e uninteresting, nobody wanted to post anymore, and even I became uninteres=
ted with my characters being on Cybertron. Trust me man, don't do it, Cyber=
tron is a deathbed...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynem=
asis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 21,=
 2001 9:43 AM
  Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)


           =
Err.. Damn AOL making a send button over a reply button making me send a bl=
ank email. Now then Dewboy to answer your question. No, I would not. As by =
becoming a council member I would essence be becoming a GM. Everyone would =
get a fair chance whether or not I liked them or didnt like them. Although =
if someone decides to needlessly piss me off about some matter within the R=
PG, such as how when me and you were making all those useless OOCs I would =
give them 3 chances, one warning, a second warning, and then a modration, a=
nd if they continue to do the same thing again I would set a motion to have=
 them booted from the RPG. 

           Also I would also like to let peopl=
e no my motives for joining the council. Although I have been in this RPG a=
 short duration compared to some I can see now that the people who particip=
ate are really treated like children rather than adults. Seriously, no inte=
rception of weapons fire? Sure it got bad a while back, but you know what p=
eople who are on the council should suck it up and deal with the problem in=
stead of just making a rule that cuts down on gameplay. How could someone d=
o that? Well one could give them a warning if they were abusing the weapons=
 fire interception, then if they persisted in abusing the thing they could =
get moderated, and then if they continued, just remove them from the RPG as=
 apparently they don't wish to be fair. 

           What would happen to t=
he charachters of the abusive person removed? Either A, give them someone, =
B recruit someone to take them, or C Take responsibility for them. Seriousl=
y it isnt that hard to control fifty charachters I have about three times t=
hat in an EZBoard Beast Wars RPG. That is because I control all the predaco=
ns as noone not even the other GM would take any of them and the only other=
 person who did have some has mysteriously dissapeared, I control around 3/=
4ths of the maximals again because the otehr GM is lazy, and I also control=
 a whole slew of custom charachters either I designed and made or someone e=
lse did and are no longer in the RPG.

           Also, I would like to hel=
p the RPG finally get off the god damn planet Earth and back to Cybertron b=
ut not following the Beast Machines story line. To me the thing was just to=
o freakishly annoying and I believe only some of the later first season was=
 actually good. Earth has been overdone, and the storyline this RPG was sup=
posed to follow has been butchered and destroyed and looks nothing like the=
 story I saw. And as for more charachters popping up from ships? Seriously =
do you know how unlikely it is that all these ships would be hitting the sa=
me god damn planet? Who here thinks we should move on to something other th=
an past Earth or Earth in Particular?

           Also I find the whole no =
hostile drone rule ridiculous to even have up there. Its BW people undestan=
d there should be no drones at all really. And as for offensive ones? Well,=
 They should ask the council first as that would be a logical idea. To make=
 things short if im elected for council I am going to try to change things =
Ill try to get RPers treated more as adults rather then the imature kids th=
at I feel they are being treated like now. Any more questions? Comments? 
 =
       Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
             
   =
    
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of=
 Service.
